entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Friday 31 March 2023
